resource_id.description: id of the resource (currently denotes which resource within the transaction - Currently deprecated)

mime_type.description: mime type that the document should be rendered as

document_type.description: indicates the document or report type to be generated from the resource data. Currently not implemented

is_public_location_required.description: indicates that a public location is needed when informing where the document has been stored

size.description: value to denote the size of the document stored in bytes

description_values.description: a map of key/value pairs used to complete the looked up description identifier enum to turn it into a full description

location.description: location where the document has been stored, which can be private (default) or public. To request a public location, the is_public_location_required flag needs to be passed as true
